title: React Portfolio Site
description: This portfolio site, built with React and Tailwind.

title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
description: A game of rock, paper, scissors played in the browser against the computer. The first to five points wins!

title: JavaScript Quiz
description: A quiz written in JavaScript which dynamically shows Q&As on the page and keeps a record of high scores using local storage.

title: README Generator
description: A node app which will automatically create a professional README file from information prompts and terminal input from a user.

title: Weather Forecast Dashboard
description: A weather forecasting dashboard utilising third-party APIs for current/future weather forecasts. Local storage retains a history of repeatable previous searches.

title: PupVenture!
description: A collaborative project to create a website which allows for dog-friendly locations to be searched for, returned dynamically via APIs and saved for future reference.
